titles: All gentlemen merchants, and others, may please to take notice, that if they send their letters by the old post, ...
notes: Title from opening words of text.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "The same 2d of April this was cast about upon the Exchange".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
